title: Sber
description: During my time at Sberbank, I designed a range of banking products for both clients and bank employees. A significant amount of user experience research was conducted. Based on the data collected, new user interface solutions were conceived and implemented, ultimately setting a trend in the banking industry. This led to a 25% increase in the bank's new customer acquisition metrics.
